DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim investigate effectiveness Emotion Regulation Group Therapy ( ERGT ) woman self-harm ordinary psychiatric outpatient health care .
DOC.brief_title: ERGT Women Engaging NSSI - Effectiveness Study
DOC.criteria: NSSI minimum three time last six month Meets least three criterion Borderline Personality Disorder accord DSMIVTR Contact individual therapist , psychiatrist , `` case manager '' equal Insertion/withdrawal psychopharmacological substance within two month prior treatment Other acute primary axis I diagnosis ( e.g . anorexia nervosa ) demand treatment first hand Bipolar disorder I primary psychosis Current substance dependence ( last month ) Current life circumstance would hinder treatment ( i.e . ongoing domestic abuse ) Insufficient Swedish language skill Cocurrent treatment Mentalization base therapy ( MBT ) Dialectical behavioral therapy ( DBT )
